name: Accounts
description: The Accounts model manages a collection of financial accounts within the system. Each account entry encapsulates essential information such as the account's identity, type, associated budget path, and related account details.

operations.name: CREATE_ACCOUNT
operations.description: Adds a new account to the accounts state.
operations.schema:
input CreateAccountInput {
    id: OID!
	name: OLabel  		
    accountTransactionsId: PHID
	chain: String
	account: EthereumAddress
	budgetPath: String
	type: AccountType
	owners: [PHID]
}

enum AccountType {
	Protocol
	Auditor
	Operational
	Payment Processor
}

operations.name: UPDATE_ACCOUNT
operations.description: Updates an existing account in the accounts state.
operations.schema:
input UpdateAccountInput {
    id: OID!
    name: OLabel  
    accountTransactionsId: PHID
    chain: String
    account: EthereumAddress
    budgetPath: String
    type: AccountType
    owners: [PHID]
}

enum AccountType {
	Protocol
	Auditor
	Operational
	Payment Processor
}
